title: tEDittEDi
sahitya:
tEDittEDi alaindEn ennaiyanE tEDittEDi alaindEn unnaikkANa ODI Odi iLaittEn ennaiyanE nAn


anupallavi

  vADi vADi manattil nADi unnaruL tEDi un pugazh pADip-pArtanilengum


caraNam    satsangam pENum sAdhu janangaLilum nittam uzhaittu amuduNNum anbarilum
 eddinamum toNDu sheidiDum bhaktarilum attanE unranaik-kaNDuLLam kaLittEn
